priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire SF36 v2.0 Acute Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C101884

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SF36 v2.0 Acute Test Code Terminology

definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 test code.
name: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SF36 v2.0 Acute Test Code Terminology
synonyms: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - In general, would you say your health is.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - In General You Say Your Health Is
synonyms: SF364-In General You Say Your Health Is

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Compared to one week ago, how would you rate your health in general now?
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Comp Week Ago Rate Gen Health Now
synonyms: SF364-Comp Week Ago Rate Gen Health Now

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - vigorous activities, such as running, lifting heavy objects, participating in strenuous sports.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Vigorous Activities

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Moderate Activities

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - lifting or carrying groceries.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Lifting or Carrying

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - climbing several flights of stairs.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Climbing Several Flights

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - climbing one flight of stairs.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Climbing One Flight Stairs

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - bending, kneeling, or stooping.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Bending/Kneeling/Stooping

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - walking more than a mile.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Walking More Than a Mile
synonyms: SF364-Limit Walking More Than a Mile

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - walking several hundred yards.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Walking Several Hundred Yds

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - walking one hundred yards.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Walking One Hundred Yards

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much does your health now limit you in - bathing or dressing yourself.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Limit Bathing or Dressing Yourself

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much of the time have you had any problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health - cut down on the amount of time you spent on work or other activities.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Physical: Cut Down Time on Work
synonyms: SF364-Physical: Cut Down Time on Work

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much of the time have you had any problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health - accomplished less than you would like.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Physical: Accomplished Less

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much of the time have you had any problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health - were limited in the kind of work or other activities.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Physical: Limited Kind of Work

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much of the time have you had any problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health - had difficulty performing the work or other activities (for example, it took extra effort).
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Physical: Difficulty Perform Work

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much of the time have you had problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious) - cut down on the amount of time you spent on work or other activities.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Emotional: Cut Down Time on Work
synonyms: SF364-Emotional: Cut Down Time on Work

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much of the time have you had problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious) - accomplished less than you would like.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Emotional: Accomplished Less

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much of the time have you had problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious) - did work or other activities less carefully than usual.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Emotional: Did Work Less Carefully

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, to what extent has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors, or groups?
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Extent Phys/Emotional Interfered

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How much bodily pain have you had during the past week?
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - How Much Bodily Pain Have You Had
synonyms: SF364-How Much Bodily Pain Have You Had

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much did pain interfere with your normal work (including both work outside the home and housework)?
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Pain Interfere With Normal Work

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - did you feel full of life.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Did You Feel Full of Life
synonyms: SF364-Did You Feel Full of Life

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - have you been very nervous.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Have You Been Very Nervous

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - have you felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer you up.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Felt Down Nothing Cheer You Up
synonyms: SF364-Felt Down Nothing Cheer You Up

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - have you felt calm and peaceful.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful
synonyms: SF364-Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - did you have a lot of energy.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Did You Have a Lot of Energy
synonyms: SF364-Did You Have a Lot of Energy

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - have you felt downhearted and depressed.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - You Felt Downhearted and Depressed

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - did you feel worn out.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Did You Feel Worn Out

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - have you been happy.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Have You Been Happy

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - Please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. How much of the time during the past week - did you feel tired.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Did You Feel Tired

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - During the past week, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities (like visiting friends, relatives, etc.)?
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Time Phys/Emotional Interfered

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is the following statement for you - I seem to get sick a little easier than other people.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Get Sick Little Easier Than Other
synonyms: SF364-Get Sick Little Easier Than Other

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is the following statement for you - I am as healthy as anybody I know.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - I Am as Healthy as Anybody I Know
synonyms: SF364-I Am as Healthy as Anybody I Know

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is the following statement for you - I expect my health to get worse.
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - I Expect My Health to Get Worse
synonyms: SF364-I Expect My Health to Get Worse

terms.definition: The Short Form 36 Health Survey Acute, US Version 2.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is the following statement for you - my health is excellent
terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - My Health is Excellent

terms.preferredTerm: SF-36 v2.0 Acute - Physical Functioning 0-100 Score
